description: The degree of presence for the required data attribute values
The degree of presence or diversity for data attributes
Ratio of non-empty values for the attribute

friendly_name: Is attribute defined for at least one sample?
description: 1 if attribute is defined for at least one sample, 0 if it contains only empty values

friendly_name: Is attribute defined for all samples?
description: 1 if attribute is defined for all samples, 0 otherwise
Average ratio of non-empty values calculated over all attributes
Minimal ratio of non-empty values among all attributes
Average ratio of non-empty values calculated over all attributes taking into account importance weights

friendly_name: Ratio of attributes defined for all samples
description: Ratio of attributes defined for all samples

friendly_name: Ratio of attributes not defined for any sample
description: Ratio of attributes not defined for any sample

friendly_name: Are all attributes defined for at least one sample?
description: 1 if all attributes contain at least one value, 0 if collection contains empty attributes

friendly_name: Are all attributes defined for all samples?
description: 1 if all attributes are defined for all samples, 0 if at least one attribute contains empty values

friendly_name: Ratio of diverse concepts for the attribute
description: Ratio of diverse concepts to the total number of concepts defined for this attribute

friendly_name: Ratio of diverse concepts to the collection
description: Ratio of diverse concepts to the total number of concepts defined for all attributes of this collection
